Package Game.Entities.Enemies

Class BomberGhost

java.lang.Object
Game.Entities.Commons.Entity
Game.Entities.Enemies.Enemy
Game.Entities.Enemies.Bomber
Game.Entities.Enemies.BomberGhost
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity, IBehaviour
public class BomberGhost extends Bomber
Class that represents a BomberGhost enemy. Inherits Bomber logic and state setup for ghost-type bombers.

  • Constructor Details

    • BomberGhost

      public BomberGhost(Health health, IGameObject player, List<Point> patrolPoints, double patrolSpeed, double detectionRadius, double attackRadius, double chaseSpeed, double forgetfullRadius)
      Constructs a BomberGhost enemy with patrol, chase, attack, and dead states.
      Parameters:
      health - the health manager
      player - the player game object
      patrolPoints - the patrol points for the bomber
      patrolSpeed - the speed while patrolling
      detectionRadius - the detection radius for chasing
      attackRadius - the radius to start attacking
      chaseSpeed - the speed while chasing
      forgetfullRadius - the radius to forget the player
